doc:
René Leprince https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ren%C3%A9_Leprince 0 René Leprince (1876 – 25 May 1929) was an early French silent film director best known for his silent films of the 1910s and 1920s. In film, Leprince began as an actor in 1908 and dabbled with directing. In 1911 he moved into directing permanently and directed some 70 films between 1908 and 1929. René_Leprince ( 1876 – 25_May_1929 ) was an_early_French_silent_film_director best known for his_silent_films of the_1910s_and_1920s . In film , Leprince began as an_actor in 1908 and dabbled with directing . In 1911 he moved into directing permanently and directed some_70_films between 1908_and_1929 .
